choices: To make some money by getting tickled
1.content:
The weather is pleasantly breezy in this hilly region. A bucket of sunlight trickles through the gentle oaks, speckling the grass. But more importantly, you have arrived at the absolute Mecca of tickling: The Mansion.

It's not really a mansion at all, assuming this is the right place. A monolithic and modern structure stands before you. Built of earth-toned stones and glass, the structure looks more like a museum or concert hall.

Now, at last, you can get what you came for:
1.title: On the threshhold

11.content:
You approach the enormous Oak door. Complex carvings of feathers and some sort of story cover the entirety. Despite it's ancient appearance, it slides open electrically. Inside is a modern lobby made of glass and brushed aluminum.

A friendly creature greets you at the desk and gives you a visitor's pass. "There will be a tour in a few minutes if you want to wait," she says.

What are you, by the way?
11.title: Just to have some fun

111.content: You are a Shiny Mew. You are blue with purple eyes, and you are around 3'4. You also can't wait to be tickled!
111.title: Mew Mew!

choices: Thanks,but no thanks. I'd like to take the regular tour for now-maybe next time?
"Sure I'll go with you. Sounds like fun."
113.content:
"Thank-you, ma'am." You say, strolling away from the desk to make room for the next person in line. As you glance more throughorly over the impressive, shiny room, your own reflection catches your eye in the curve of a space-age row of comfortable seats. " You grin to yourself as you notice the way your plain, sleevless shirt-something you always wore before on the many occaisions you went looking for someone to tickle you- rides up, exposing several inches of midrift between it and the hem of your low worn jeans.
         Just the essemblage for every tickle-enthusiast to wear in a place like this.
         "Hey, girl. Whatcha' doin"?" A red-fox anthro guy bounds up to you, grinning crazily, bare paws hardly making a noise on the carpeted floor. You spin to regard him, seeing he's wearing another pair of jeans and a leather vest over his tall, muscular frame.
         "Oh, uh, nothing much. Just waiting for the tour to start." You reply, smiling back. For some ineffable reason you find his wildly eager and ecstatic expression mildly funny.
"The tour? Bah, that's just what everbody sees. Hey-I can show you all sorts of cool places only the staff get to usually see, if you want. Name's DJ-I work here part time anyways. What do they call you?" You introduce yourself, and then turn as something blares out over the speaker system.
         A dozen or so people-and other, more exotic things- stand up and crowd around one large doorway, impatiently waiting for the tour to commence. You giggle as several fur covered fingers suddenly poke you in the exposed side, and look back to the culprit; DJ, still grinning that crazy grin of his.
113.title: Humans & Humanoids.

choices: Just jog down the nearest passage!
Ask someone to search with you.
1131.content:
He looks slightly dissapointed, but hides it well. "Okay, babe, it's your call. I work over in the south-east section. Give me a call if you get the chance!" He gets his grin back and bounds away, as you join the small crowd comprising the tour group. You leave the entrance hall and pass through several exhibits, the guide explaining the Mansion's history and features; as well as no small amount of information on tickling. Eventually, you reach a six-way intersection, and the tour-guide pauses.

          "Ladies and gentle-things, a kind of scavenger hunt will now go into session for those who wish to play. Simply collect the required items from around the building in the alotted time, and then meet up back here or at the entrance to recieve a prize. You can collect the item lists and the tickets-which cost 2$ a piece-over there at the kiosk. If you wish to quit, I'm afraid the tickets are non-refundable. But from here, the Entrance is back down that large hallway there. The tour will be moving on in a few moments. Thank-you."

         You think for a few moments, reasoning that two dollars won't be missed anytime soon, and exploring the place independently might be fun on it's own. You get into the short line to buy a list and a ticket, before studying each hallway as the remiander of the tour moves off. You're anxious to go looking for the items right away, but pause as it occurs to you to ask another one of the other participants for help.
1131.title: Scavenger Hunt!

choices: "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA," I fell to the ground, laughing uncontrollably.
"AHAHAHAHAHA," I tried to break out of his grasp.
1132.content: "Ticklish?" The man grinned. I ran for it but he caught me around the waist and stroked my side with his finger. I squirmed trying to hold my laughter, but he started tickling my side.
1132.title: "Sure I'll go with you. Sounds like fun...

11321.content:
He then picked me up and threw me over his shoulder. His fingers started poking and teasing the backs of my knees, making me squeal and giggle like a wild woman.

The next thing I knew, I was suddenly thrown down onto a bed, still laughing as he crawled over me, "Where are we?" I asked.

"This is where I like to bring pretty little things like you. Sometimes I tie 'em up, sometimes I just hold 'em down and tickle them to tears," he spidered his fingers around your sides, making you giggle as he continued to speak.

"So, are you ready for the tickling of your life?" he asked.
11321.title: "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA," I fell to the ground...

choices: He started circling your innie with his index finger
He jumped down to your feet
113212.content:
"Challenge accepted!" with that, he started squeezing and pinching your sides, and you squeal and cackle like never before. DJ laughs along with you, clearly enjoying you struggle.

His hands suddenly jump from your sides to your belly, spidering all over you skin. You give out a shriek, his fingers sending electric, tickly pulses you had never felt before. The next thing you knew...
113212.title: "Do your worst!"

114.content: You are a grey wolf around the age of 13,you have large paws much bigger then a wolfs at your age.You sit down and see a tiger girl about the same age as you sitting infront of you. She looks down at your paws and asks
114.title: Wolf

1141.content:
Flustered by the question, you politely answer, "Ok, I don't mind." to the Tiger girl. She gives off a big smile as you give her your paws. Her eyes are entranced by your big pads on your toes and soles, she lightly pokes them, causing a slight snicker to slip from your mouth.

"OMG, these are so cute!" The tiger girl says excitedly, she starts to play with your toes, wiggling them one at a time. You giggle from the ticklishness of your toes, slightly moving your feet. She then traps your feet between her things, poking, rubbing, even lightly tickling them. Your giggles turn into full-blown laughter from the teasing tickles. She stops after a while.

"Oops, sorry, got carried away..." The tiger girl blushed. "Y'know, I actually have a part-time job here, heck, I have my own room to tickle people with. Would you like to come with me?"
1141.title: Could I see your paws?

11411.content:
"Oh, that's great! The name's Sasha, by the way." She says shaking your hand. She takes you up the stairs, and through a long hallway.

"My room is just down here!" Sahsa exclaims.

The hallway is lined with redwood doors, all with some sort of combanation of letters and numbers. She leads you to a door that reads, "D3E4".

"And this is my room, c'mon in!" The tiger pushes you in.

It's a nice sized room with a smooth light blue tile flooring, and similar colored walls. The walls are lined with cabinets that hold a multiude of instruments for tickling. What catches your attention is the device in the center of the room. It is a chair that leans back; is lined with belts, and at the foot of the chair is a set of stocks. You approach the chair, inspecting the seat and belts.

"You like it? I had it custom-made. Now, ready to start?" Sasha asks.

You nod as you climb into the chair. She holds your arms up, bending them at the elbow, they are strapped in by the wrists. Next came your chest and waist, which were secured with belts. Finally, she straps in your legs by the thigh, and locks your feet into the stocks.

"There we go, all strapped in! Now, I have a few tools they gave me. Which one should I tickle you with?"
11411.title: Sure!

115.content: You are a younge dragon around 14, hoping for a good time. Not really wanting to wait for a tour, you set off down a long hallway, looking at all the doors, each having different tickle-themed labels on them. Finally, you come to two doors at the end of the hall. One says 'scaleys' and the other says 'furies'. Which do you choose?
115.title: Something smooth-skinned or dragon-like

choices: Now, how do these beauties taste?
Busted! Turns out that this is an 'Employees Only' section!
Find a different pair of feet.
1151.content:
The smallish room beyond is somewhat different than you had anticipated. Or, indeed, given your experiences, anything you reasonably could have had anticipated: The sides are lined with rows of feet.
         Poking directly out of the walls, coloured a subdued blue, are countless sets of Scaly feet, all mounted on wooden plaques like just so many hunting trophies. Bi-tri-quad-and quint clawed feet are all represented in abundance, and come in countless sizes and varieties. One pair of pudgy green specimens which rest alone against the far wall are large enough to make a comfortable chair, and are orientated that they might have been intended to be used as such.
         Awed by the sheer scale of the perfect green soles, you approach in a daze. You intentionally flick your tail over the various prepared soles as you pass, dispelling any suspicions you might have had that they might not have been organic as you feel them squirm in your wake, various clawed soles tugging pointlessly as the restraints holding them back.
         Your designated targets are almost as big as you are and thoughtfully arrayed at an angle. The ending halves of the toes are embedded in the floor, while the back end of the heel is trapped in the wall, using the angles of the room itself as an ample restraint. The arches are so deep that you could sit in them like a chair.
         They must be super-sensetized if they rarely actually touch the ground... You think, reaching out a clawed hand to explore the region and test you're hypothesis. Before you even make contact, the entire fleshy green expanse trembles slightly, making an obvious but highly futile attempt to contract and pull away. What? You're kidding me! If the skin-thickness level is at all relative to the size of these babies, not to mention how all the extra weight of whatever they're supposed to be attached to might have increased the toughness level beyond the norm, then the owner must be ticklish as hell. I didn't believe that anything could be that ticklish. You think in awe. Only one way to find out.
         You dip you're claws against the soft flesh, feeling it shudder and yield slightly under your fingers. The entire foot shakes and trembles with barely-suprressed strength and conviction as you tease it, swirling your claws in increasingly expansive random patterns. The whole thing is impressively soft, and incapable of offering the slightest resistance to your merciless, relentless hands, which explore every inch of the exposed soles. You delight in the way you can gently trace your hands over it and feel is shake, seeing the individual muscles and tendons flex as it pulls on the very floor, unable to offer the slightest resistance or objection to your crawling hands.
1151.title: "Oh my... -Quick: for Science!"

choices: One on the near left side.
The door at the end of the 'arcade, or some other game.
1152.content:
Not seeing anything that proclaims this area as 'restricted', you open the door and walk through. The room is full of booths/cubicles that are arranged with one on either side of the room, with a pathway forming between them down the center. A sign is posted on a plaque directly in front of the door, stating:

         Welcome to Furcadia! In the cubicles to the right and left you will find several tickle-themed games. Most are similar to arcade-style entertainments-just put the coin in the slot on the wall and the game commences for a limited amount of time. Any kind of currency will do! Instructions and rules are to be found besides each game, should you choose to play it. Win money, tickle our exquisite victims, and have fun!

         Grinning in anticipation, you turn and walk over to a cubicle, selecting
1152.title: The road to Furcadia.

11522.content:
You walk into the small space, the walls to the left and right making it hard to determine what kind of game this is. It looks just like an old arcade game-a slanting, brightly decorated oblong box on legs with a screen. Looking bizarrley out of place are a pair of lightly fur covered, darkly padded feet potruding from the top, surrounded by several neatly arranged tickle tools. Bemused, you read the words engraved on the wall at head height.

         So, you think your a skilled tickler, huh? These feet belong to one of our lovely staff members, and she has allowed us to borrow them for this game. The better you tickle them, the higher the bar will go. If you can get to the part marked crazed!in the time limit, you'll get a prize. Good ticklin'!

         You reach into your pocket and pull out a coin, pushing it through the small slot under the sign. A digital clock lights up underneathe the notice, counting down from five minutes. Hesitantly, you scratch lightly at the arch of one soft sole. It feels real, flexing sand wiggling despite the fact that there's no room for somebody to sit or hide in the machine. Deciding not to question it, you dig deeper into the lovely curves, while laughter begins to emerge from two speakers set on the sides of the stand. Shaking your head and smiling, you begin to scratch more rapidly, the lightly pitched laughter increasing to match. This sure didn't feel like some kind of cheap machine. The bar at the back of the box begins to slowly fill with yellow, and you gleefully pull back the toes on one foot, picking up a toothbrush. The paw still waggles and jerkes about, trying to shake your fingers as they press into the sensetive digits, but the light gigling increases drastically when you begin to enthusiastilcly scrub away at the base of the toes. Chuckling a bit yourself, you start playfully nibbling at the base of the dark, main foot pad. As you begin to clean in between the toes energeticlly with the toothbrush, carfeully teasin in every little sensetive fold and niche, there is a loud ding! over the sounds of hysterical laughter. The bar has filled completely and the timer goes, signaling you to stop tickling. You put the toothbrush back, as a drawr marked 'Here is your prize!' pops open. You turn and slowly stride away from the game, examining the item. It's a small, circular pad, the underside of which is covered in bristles, with sveral small straps dangling from it. You hit a small button on the back, and the arrayed forest of bristles, whurring, move in opposite circles, while the straps tighten slightly. The directions on the back read 1. Attach firmly to body area with straps. 2. Activate. 3. Remove after desired affect had been acheived. Do not use on face.
Still smiling at the gadget, you look around, wondering what to do next.
11522.title: In the name of tickling-screw physics!

1153.content: You decide to go back down the hall and look for a different door. After a minute or o, you see a door that says "Pokemon" on it. Interested, you walk in, and see dozens of different pokemon restrained in the large room in different restraints. You walk around and try to decide which one you want to tickle. After a few minutes, you come up to a female Charizard chained to the wall. She looks at you and gets a scared look on her face. Next to her however, is a blastoise trapped in a pair of stocks, and he smiles when you look at him. Who do you tickle?
1153.title: Go and find another door

12.content:
Supposedly, someone who is really ticklish can make six figures here, which is way more than you've ever made before.

You pass through an ornate wooden door into a cold and metal lobby, which is enormous.

"Hi, I'm looking for a job as a victim," you tell to the creature behind the counter.

"You came at the right time," she replies. "I think R&D is looking to test some new technology over the next few days. Really experimental stuff."

"Where do I sign up?"

"Well, you'll have to go through processing first either way. Let me just get your information and then you're off to be tested for ticklishness."

By the way, what are you?
12.title: Windfall?

1211.content: You walk through the halls, with doors about every ten meters. An elderly dragon directs you to a door that says "room 455". You gape in disbelief at the number. Despite being shocked at the intensity of the structure and its purpose, you keep your composure when you ask," ma'am, how many rooms are there?" The dragon looks at you and says," 3,423 rooms. don't be shocked, though. Even though the building appears to be fair-sized from the outside, it stretches deep underground as well. You can explore after your tests. Now please, come in!" You watch as she ushers you into the room that...
1211.title: Noctowl

12112.content: You stand in the doorway that leads to room 455, a futuristic-living room with red fluffy carpet and... A table with metal cuffs? You are asked questions. Questions that hardly have to do with tickling at all. Finally, the dragon asks you to go lay down on the table. She presses a button on the side, and the metal cuffs slide into place. You feel them slide into place on your wings and feet. "Your tickler will be here in a few minutes". And with that, the elderly she-dragon leaves the room, leaving you restrained on a table next to a warm fireplace. The heat soothes you, and it encourages you to think about your past. You are a noctowl, living with 1 sister and two brothers living in a large sycamore tree. Your family is poor, and they had recently heard about Bing's tickle mansion. They decided to send you, because they believed the more ticklish you were, the more money you earned. Of course, you know that's not true, but it's worth it for a new home. A knock on the door sends you reeling back into reality, and you here a voice say," hello, i'm tangrowth and i'll be your client for the day. Now, let me see your record..." A large mess of vines walks into the room, and it gives you chills down your spine when you look at it's vines. They all look super ticklish! "Ah," the grass-type says," i think i'll start with...hmmm... Yes, ingenious!" You realize he is walking to your feet! you try to lean your head up to see what's going on, but a vine gently pushes it back down. "Now now, just relax..." After a few tense moments, you feel a tingling sensation on your right foot. CYou wiggle your foot to get it off. No good. Another vine joins in, attacking the dead center of your foot. You begin to giggle. "Come on, that's not laughing!" The tangrowth teases. He adds another vine to your other foot, sending you into loud bits of giggling. "Heehehehaha!heheheheeeheehee! Hahaha!" After at least fifteen minutes of him going around your feet in a delicate manner, the sensations stop. A blindfold is placed over your eyes. Uh-oh, this is gonna get better! You can't see where you'll be tickled next, so you almost jump a little when a vine begins to massage you soft, feathery belly. "Hahahahehehehahahahahaaahahehehahehahahs! HHAHAHAHAA!" The vines gently glide along the dead center of your tummy like tiny green ice skaters. HAHAHAHAAAHAAHAAHHAHAHEHEHEHAHAHAHAHAAHAA !" Now you are gasping for breath. The vines continue, but lower, just below your hipbones. The vines cease their torturous act. They then move onto your wingpits, which is easily by far your most ticklish spot. It continues to tickle, giving you considerable amounts of laughter. Next, you feel a belt being placed on you, and when it turns on, you feel laughter on waves you'd never thought could be reached before. It doesn't stop there, however. Vines come out, tickling your feet, sides, privates, and belly all over. You can't stop laughing, this is the most intense you have ever been tickled in your life. After hours of this amazingly powerful form of torture, the vines recede, one by one, until nothing is left and your restraints are unlocked. You are given your requested money, and the tangrowth leaves the room. Now done with this strange place, you...
12112.title: A futuristic living room

121121.content: Now giddy with excitement , you leave Bing's tickle mansion, with money in your beak and enough of it to buy everything your family has dreamed of. THE END
121121.title: Leave the building

121122.content: You decide to explore this amazing place. You continue along the halls for about 150 meters, until you come across a wooden ladder that goes both up and down. You decide to go...
121122.title: I want to know more

1211222.content: Instead of climbing down, you fly down, flying straight down for at least 5 minutes until you find what appears to be a prison, made with bricks similar to Minecraft's stone bricks block. It is dimly lit by torches. The occasional squeal of laughter can be heard as you walk around. Soon enough, you come upon occupied cells. The laughing grows louder. You come across pokemon tied up, chained, gagged, and restrained with laughing coming from nearly every one. You began to wonder if this is where criminals go to be tickle-tortured. After a another minute of walking/flying, you realize this is true. You take a left turn, and come face to face with someone of your own kind: a Noctowl. Chained to a slanted wooden board spread-eagle, it laughs it's eyes out while mechanical pinwheels with feathers unmercifully tickle its feet, sides, and pits. Worried you might get in trouble for being here... Nah, its safe!
1211222.title: The dungeons

choices: Free it! It doesn't deserve this!
12112222.content: "Umm...hi?" You ask through the metal bars. The Noctowl is too busy laughing to notice you. "Hi!" You say it louder and it notices you. "P-please heahahahelp me HAHAHAAAGAHAHAGHAHAHAHA!" You decide to...
12112222.title: Interaction

121122222.content: You move along, then begin to believe that you did the wrong thing, but you shrug it; off; this floor is for criminals, after all. Soon enough, you come across three pokemon in a single cell: the Kanto starters. The charmander is spread-eagle, with tentickles with feathers on the tips tickle his sides, belly, and pits. You see the squirtle, feet in a pair of stocks and arms held up by ropes with feet and pits being tickled. You see the bulbasaur, standing up with ankles locked and a belly restraint. Feathers come up through holes in the ground and tickling it's belly. All three wiggle around, but the feathers are unmerciful. They look so young, why could they possibly be locked up with the criminals? Feeling sorry for them, you...
121122222.title: Charmander, bulbasaur, squirtle

choices: Being subjected to a tickle machine
1211222221.content:
You look around and see a control pannel inside the cell. You go over to it and fiddle with the settings, sure enough the tools stop and the three pokemon are freed from their resitraints. The three collapse on the floor laying on their backs panting cutely. You walk over to the Charmander on his back.

"Are you ok?" You ask.

"Oh ye-eah, just hard tickle torture." Charmander panted.

Despite what the three went through they all had smiles on their faces.

"Were you all having fun?" You ask.

"Oh yeah, we were playing a game and got caught. We were having fun but we're not passing up a chance to escape." Bulbsuar chuckled.

With at the trio bolt out of the cell and make a run for it. You realize this was a dungeon but none of the captives here were criminals. Before you knew it a feather is aimed at your highly ticklish belly.

"Wings up!" A guard ordered,

With a nervous yet excited gulp you raise your hands above your head in surrender. Two hours later you are...
1211222221.title: Attempt to free them

12112222211.content:
Dangling by your ankles which were shackled together and on a chain connected to the ceiling. Four gloved hands scribble mercilessly along your helpless belly causing you to shake madly laughing adorably. That belly jiggled in place as those hands tortured it, though you were enjoying youself immensly as you were relentlessly tickled. Two feather rollers go up and down the center of your belly, you arch your back squealing in mad laughter.

As you laugh your head off you notice a Pikachu silently creep into the room. There were several buttons along the floor meant to capture anyone who stepped on them. You think it over sure your enjoying yourself, but perhaps an escape attempt might mean a more intense tickling. You struggle to maintain your thoughts through your laughter.

You decide too.....
12112222211.title: Chained upside down

1211222222.content: They look so young. Why would they be locked up in such a place. You take a step closer, but an Anthro dragon with an iron-tipped spear walks around the corner and points his spear at you, jabbing you with it. "Hey, that hurts!" You say. " keep a safe distance. They're wanted criminals." You stare at the three children, mystified as to why such little pokemon would end up like this. You turn back around back to the pokemon. Before you mamnage to take a step further, the guard warns," keep away, or your joining them!"
1211222222.title: Talk with them

12112222221.content: You take a step further, and you land on the ground a split second later with a sickening thud." I warned you..." After an unknown amount of time, you wake up with a headache and you realize: your next to the three pokemon you saw earlier... but your inside the cell. You realize you are spread eagle like the charmander, and featherwheels sit motionless at you sides, feet, and pits. They boot up, and you never see the light of day again...
12112222221.title: Disobey

12112222222.content: "Ok," you sigh. The dragon walks over to a hole in the wall, where he pulls a small lever. The feathers and tentickles stop their torturous act. The three stop wiggling around. Before you speak, the dragon puts his spear in front of you and says," one rule: don't go too close. These critters are more dangerous than you think." You walk up until you are face to face with them. They look at you with puppy eyes, making you want to cry.
12112222222.title: Obey

1212.content: You walk towards the large hallway, walking past ornate feathers in glass cases. Some have labels, like "world's most ticklish feather", and "most successful tickler". Finally, you reach room 455. This is it, you think to yourself, this will make my dreams come true! When you reach the door, you knock on it and an elderly anthro raccoon says," right this way, sir." You are ushered into...
1212.title: Raichu

1231.content: Your Name is Alex Corbin. You're 21, American, and about to get some cash. You wait in the huge room with some other strange looking creatures. You've been on the internet more than once, so you know most of them are these things called "furries" while the rest are just humans and things you have never seen before. You start a conversation with this blue-looking thing that reminds you of sonic the headgehog if he was a dog and a lot taller. Finnaly, someone you in and calls you name. You get up and follow her (you guess it's a her from it's voice, it's really weird looking...) to the hallway. You go
1231.title: Yo Homie

12311.content:
Your guide leads you down the left corridor you go past rows of doors, all of them closed. You try to see through the clouded glass windows but can't make anything out. Eventually you come to an open door and an empty room. "If you would like to step inside and remove all your clothing the Professor will be with you shortly." Says the whatever it is before moving back down from where you came from. Stepping into the room the first thing you notice is a table, dead centre in the room. It's padded and covered with restraints as well as an assortment of joints and stuff underneath the table. It seems as though it can be move into different positions to allow access to different part of the victims body. In one corner there is a desk with a computor and normal desk items and in the other corner is a...what the heck is that? There's an odd machine almost like an MRI scanner but somethings different about it.

"Whatever, better get out of these clothes," you think. You kick of your shoes and then remove your shirt. Then in one move you pull down your pants and boxers stepping out of them and removing your socks along the way. Unsure of what to do with them you dump your clothes next to the desk and sit up on the padded table waiting for the Proffesor, your hands automatically covering your groin.

Eventually the door opens and a human man walks in. Hes about 30 with short black hair and is wearing a white lab coat. "Ah you must be Alex. I'm Professor Alex Miller!" He says with a warm smile and extends his hand "no need to be shy, im a professional, I've seen it all before," and eventually you uncover your groin to shake his hand. "Now thank you for volunteering with us today, all you have to do is stay for the entire procedure and you'll get paid. Unfortunetly, if you bottle out mid way through then no money for you. We're going to start by mapping out your tickle areas. This will provide us with information on which prototypes will be best to test on you as well as what to expect so our results are accurate. To do this we use that big machine over there." He motions to the MRI thing you noticed earlier. "What does that do?" You ask
"Well first we strap this funny looking hat to your head to measure your brain waves. Then this machine will scan you to find ever neuron receptor site on your body that responds to tickling. Once these are located, what can only be described as, a tickling laser will target and stimulate each and every one, at a time. The hat will then measure how much your brain reacts to the stimulation. The greater the reaction the more ticklish you'll be in that area."
"Erm ok, so how long will that take?" You ask, it sounds quite complex.
"It's actually pretty fast, you'll have an odd tingling sensation for about 5 seconds and then your done. Now if you'd like to lie upon the bed we can begin." You walk over to the 'bed' which is basically just a clear plastic rectangle sticking out the machine. You are instructed to lie down flat on your back with your arms above your head and once down you attempt to get some comfort on the cold hard surface but it's pretty much in vain. "Yeah sorry about that." Says Alex "but we need a see through surface so that the lasers can get the whole of your body, try not to fidget too much."

Once your in position Alex flicks some switches and you move into the machine. It's lit well and the 'bed your lying on is surrounded by a glass tube. Past the glass is a frame with a lots of mini dots seemingly randomly placed about it. You assume this is where the tickle lasers come form. Also attached to the frame is a thin box that is the length of your whole body. 12511.content:
The room you entered is pretty bare, with plain white wallpaper and simple red carpet. The texture feels good and slightly tickly against your bare feet as you walk over and sit down in the giant chair the receptionist beckons to. There is another one like it, only opposite you and on the other side of a small table.

These aren't the only furnishings however. Towards the back of the room is a table that looks like something from a doctor's office: the bed patients sit on. The examination table has a set of stocks at the foot of it, and a pair of manacles at the head with chains attached to the floor. You notice an extra touch: clasps on the sides of the table, meant to keep your wings from covering your body.

"Any questions before I leave?" asks the receptionist.

"Yes actually. What happens now?" you respond. She doesn't exactly make it too obvious.

"Right, sorry. Let me explain; in a few minutes, one of our examiners will come sit with you and ask a few questions. After that, she will ask you to lie on that examination table back there, strap you, and tickle you according to your answers." The explanation is a little cryptic and long, but you get the idea.

Closing the door behind her, the receptionist promptly leaves to the other visitors in the lobby. You relax in the giant comfy chair, letting the excitement and nervousness wash over you. It helps that the carpet and walls of the room are solid colors, as it distracts you less from your bubble of focus.

Not too long after you settle down, the examiner comes enters the room and smiles warmly. She's a human, slightly shorter than you and very slim. Her brown hair falls to her shoulders and her turquoise eyes are filled with a calm happiness that seems to emanate from her.

"Hello. You're here to have your ticklishness tested, right?" You nod. "Of corse you are," she continues. Smiling at you, she makes her way to the chair opposite you and sits. A clipboard is held in her left arm, with a pen and a few sheets of paper. Looking through them, she says "I'm going to ask you a few questions. We simply want to make sure you're comfortable. First of all, your age?"

"Fourteen," you answer. Dragons always strike out at a very young age, which seems an odd practice but too deeply ingrained to change.

"Mm-hmm. And where were you born?"

The questions carry on like that for a while, personal but unrelated to tickling. Slowly though, the questions become things like "Have you ever been bound while being tickled?" and "Have you every tickled someone else?" (the answer to both of them being yes). As the examiner nears the part where your test begins, she gets up and moves over towards the examination table.

"Alright. Well, according to these results you are hyper ticklish all over, no one spot being less ticklish than any other." This is true: the slightest touch anywhere causes you to burst out giggling, and you have no preferences as to where you are tickled.

"Okay then, if you could please lie down we'll begin with the next part of your test: the examination." She says it with a look of absolute calm, which in turns helps settles you a bit. Walking over, you stretch yourself out on the table.

The examiner locks your feet in the stocks, then uses the same key to shackle your wrists. Even your wings are pulled taught by the restraints on either side of the bed. Once finished, you are spread taught out open and exposed on the examination table, with your arms high above your head. Your ankles are locked in the stocks far away from each other, exposing your thighs and knees. Defenseless much?

"Now I'm going to tickle you all over your body for ten minutes," says your tester. "If the data I get is insufficient, the process will be repeated. If you truly are unable to endure any more, yell mansion." And with that, she starts reaching for your...

Inching along the hallway, ready to turn and retreat at a nano-second's forewarning, you creep through a doorway. The room is of medium size, and brightly lit by windows. These illuminate plain, white washed walls, a floor coverd in a firm but overall giving material, and a set of stocks in the room's center. They are occupied by an anthro tiger, panting lightly and staring out another doorway on the room's opposite side. He wheels his head around at the sound of your voice: "Hi there, mate. Err, are you in trouble?" You walk up to him so that your standing over his trapped paws, as he replies: "Hello. I was just being tickled by some lady, but she went out that way." He inclines his head in the direction of the doorway."Can you please tell me where I am, and maybe get me out of here?" He waggles his toes, pulling at one side of his restraints with his hands. "Sure." You bend down to see how the stocks are locked together. "Hold on, I think these aren't very tricky to undo, just pull this little catch here and..." The stocks pop open, and the tiger stands up, stretching luxuriously. "Thanks a million, man. But where am I?"
"Oh, Bing's Tickle Mansion. I'm here to find a friend of mine, but I'll admit I don't know much about this place, other than it's virtually the tickling capitol of the world. So, how did you get here?"
"Me? Oh, I only woke up a few minutes ago. There was this cute tigress tickling my foot-paw, but she left to go get something or other. She could be back any minute. I'm Hobbes." You shake, and have just finished introducing yourself when a feminine voice cries from the far entrance "What's this?/! My new toy has gotten out! And-ah!-an intruder! get them!" Standing in the doorway, a slight tigress with red hair and green eyes, and wearing a simplistic orange dress, is gesturing towards while looking rather unhappy. She's flanked by two fairly large, quite rough looking creatures, both of whom are advancing on you with obvious intent to harm. "C'mon!" You yell, seizing Hobbes by the arm and bolting down from the corridor, the two creatures and thier mistress in close persuit.


Arriving at an intersection, you use your second of time ahead of your persuers to...
144121.title: Introducing (Hobbes was created by Bill Watterson)

choices: Go look somwhere else. Or something catches your attention. Or something else.
1441211.content:
"Quick, in here!" You say, wrenching open a nearby door and leaping inside, Hobbes flying in behind you. Sitting in the darkness, you listen to the sounds of twin pairs of heavy footsteps aproaching, clamouring nearby, and then slowly receding again. Sighing with releife, you open the door a crack, and peek out. The tigress is standing right outside, hands on slender hips. "Now where have those bozos got to?" She grunmbles. "How long does it take them to apprehend a few intruders? (sigh) I'll think I'll wait for them here." She takes a seat on a stone bench right out side your hiding place. Pulling back from the door, your head bumps against a pair of somethings hanging from the ceiling. Examination shows them to be leather restraints and cuffs. Suddenly, a wicked idea barges into your mind. "Hey, Hobbes." You say slyly. "How's about a little revenge on our friend out there? Maybe teach her a lesson or two where setting huge, ravening monsters on unlucky people are concerned."
          "Er, what do you mean?"
         "Just watch." You find the light-switch, flick it, and swing the door open. The tigress turns at the noise, and youv'e grabbed her and yanked her inside before she can scream. Swiftly clapping the leather cuffs over her wrists, hoisting her arms above her head, you procede to bind her foot-paws a similiar was to the floor, but with her legs held wider and with less wriggle room. "Right," You say regarding her triumphantly. "I think its my duty, as a nice person, to teach you a few things about kidnapping and sending monsters after unfortunate people." She just stares at you, looking more than a little scared to be at your mercy and with her sidekicks so far away. "As we are at Bing's Tickle Mansion, I think I should start your instruction by tickling you." Her eyes widen and she lets out a little gasp as yoiu poke her in the belly. Seeing this, you put a hand to each of her sides, holding them steady while you enthusiastically dig a thumbclaw into a pair of sensitive spots just above her waist. 'Hahahah! I'msohohosohorry!Pleeheehesestohohop!"
         "Join in Hobbes, it's even funner than it looks." Initially he seems reluctant, many people are when it comes to tickle-torture, but he soon gets going pretty hard on your captive's helpless armpits, scratching with his short little claws while you go at her belly and sides.
         After an undisturbed while, you let up the punishment. Exhausted by your sctions, she hangs, almost limp, in her restraints. You cup her delicate chin in your hand, forcing her to look you in the eye. "Now, I expect that you work here." She nods. "Good. Tell me, where are the dungeons? Or wherever it is that you keep your captives awaiting tickling?" She sighs. "From here? Go down the opposite corridor from this room, you should come to a spiral staircase. Follow it down and you'll be at the dungeons."
         "Good. Now, I'm going to stop tickling you, and leave the door open so that someone-hopefeully, for your sake, someone who enjoys tickling less than me- will find you and untie you. Do not start calling for help until wer're well away from here. Got that?" She gives an energetic nod. "Good. And remember, if it turns out that you've lied to us or sent us into a trap, we know right where to find you." You give her armpit one last scratch, making her jump, before striding from the small room, Hobbes in tow.
1441211.title: A lesson in manners.

choices: You give her a few more 'lessons'.
Someone comes down the hallway and interupts you. (Or something else)
1441212.content:
Sprinting along the corridor, the way suddenly opens up in an intersection with several hallways running off it. Panicking, as you can hear your persuers right behind you, you leap down a small side passage-perhaps to small for those things- and keep running.
         Sometime later, you can't run any more, and flop down on the thick carpet, panting heavily. Hobbes virtually collapses next to you. "I think (pant) we lost them (pant pant)." He Gasps. It seems he's right; as there's no sign of the three any-where. Collecting yourselves, you eventually catch you breathe and continue on.
          Rounding a bend, you step into a rectangular room, more of a wider stretch of hallway, really, with two rows of pillars running through it. The nearest one looks broken or somehow damaged, but a quick inspection shows that it was built with two large sections that fold out near the base, with holes in them closer to the floor. Idly wondering what that could be disigned for, but not giving it much thought, you press on, Hobbes almost literally on your tail. Suddenly, the calm quiet of the hallway is cut into by "Eeeck! C'mon Rise- please don't tickle meheeheehee!" At the last pair of pillars, a creature resembling a small fox-type furry with reddish fur is trapped in the columm itself, with just her paws and head sticking out, and her white belly showing though a squareish gap cut into her confines. A similar furry, also with white on the tips of her ears,tail and belly, but with golden-bronze fur, is engrossed with tickling the helpless vixen. "Cootchie-cootchie -coo, Set. I think some revenge is in order after what you did to me back there." She purrs, tickling her captive's left foot-paw with one hand while running the other's pionter digit down her soft belly. "Hahahahaha!" Is all she gets as a replie.
         Grinning, you motion for Hobbes to be quiet and walk up behind the golden-furred gal. So engaged with tickling, she doesn't hear you. In fact, it's only when you put your paws to her sides and start tickling her enthusiastically that she acknowledges you, witch she does by leaping up a foot into the air, and bringing her arms in towards her body in a futile gesture to lessen the tickling. "What the-hahhaha! Whos there?" She squeaks, falling to her knees, and then the floor, to escape your tickling hands. "Oh, I just thought I'd interupt you to tell you that that's no way to tickle someone; and I suppose I'll have to demonstrate to you how to do it otherwise." Standing up, the vixen would be under five feet tall, much smaller than you, and your alot stronger than she is. Kneeling down, you stradle her waist, then sieze her wrists with your hands, before putting them both in one of your paws and pinning them above her head. "For starters,your only spider tickling her belly, like this." You waggle your fingers against her side, making her giggle. "That's great to begin with, but if you want to really tickle someone, try this." You form your right hand into a 'pincer' shape and start going at her side, digging in the thumb. This causes her to burst out laughing and squirm wildly, trying to break free of your grip. "Wow!" You exclaim. "You really are ticklish! I think I better give you a few more lessons, and maybe punish you for tickling that helpless girl over there like that."
1441212.title: New acquaintances.

14412121.content:
With the other anthro helplessly looking on, you continue your 'lesson'. "Righto, now let's see, got the sides covered, now lets move onto the tummy." She gulps and starts squirming wildly beneathe your grip as you slowly drag a fingertip along her soft belly fur. "Now," You explain. "See how I'm only lightly dragging the tip? That really drives the nerves crazy to get in some real tickling action. Now here's how you do it; looong strokes, veeery lightly..." The Vixen starts giggling up a storm as you continue her education. "Also, tracing patterns to new, untouched areas keeps the sensation fresh and makes sure that the other areas don't get used to the tickling, which can greatly lessen the sensation. Observe this spiral pattern, here. It allows me to get in closer to another place that's always super-sensetive to touch. The..." You pause for effect. The fox has been giggling uncontroloably the entire time, but now falls silent and stares at you with horror. She knows what you're talking about. "...Bellybutton!" You exclaim, digging in a finger on your free hand, making your helpless captive thrash with surprising stregnth. "For this special place, nothing beets the superb raspbeerie! Observe:" Without warning, you dip your head forward and start blowing a long, drawn-out raspberrie over the vixen's navel. She shakes all over at this, desperately trying to free herself, to no use. Eventually, you completely run out of breath and remove your mouth. "Now, before I put some of these techniques to good use on you, can you tell me your name? And why, besides the obvious, you were tickling that other vixen?" You enquire. She sighs.
          'I'm Sun-rise, and that's my twin sister Sun-set, but you can call us just Rise and Set. We both just woke up in this place afew hours earlier, and we were both tied up. She got out fist and started tickling me like crazy. Now that I've managed to escape and trick her into those stocks, I thought it was high time for some payback."
         "Hmm,"You muse."I suppose I can't start punishing you for getting even, but I can't really think of another excuse to tickle you right now...-I've got it! We'll let out Sun-set, and then you two can have a ticklefight! First person to say 'uncle' loses and gets put in the stocks and gang-tickled by all of us. In exchange I won't tickle you rigth now, at the very least. Sound like a plan?" You receive a nod, and let the diminutive furry up, before hlping Hobbes free Rise. "Okay," You say. "Here's the rules: no intentional hitting, kicking, punching, or biting, only tickle. Doing one of these things wll result in one of the reffs-myself and Hobbes here- joining the battle on the side of the offender's opponent. You can yell the surrender word any time you like, at which point the battle will end and the loser ends up in these."You pat the restraint-pillar lovingly. "We begin in three, two, one, ding!"
14412121.title: Dispute settling.

144121212.content:
"Well, sis'. I guess I'll have to get back at you the hard way." Muses Rise, as the two begin to circle. "Huh. Yeah, like that's gonna happen. You never could withstand me tickling you." Returns Set, and dives at her opponent. Rise backpedals, and her sister comes up short, poking and reaching out her paws to tickle her furiously. Rise giggles and pulls her arm in sharply as one of Set's hands touches her armpit and commences scratching frenetically. "Hehehe! Take this!" Rise delivers a storm of pokes to her sibling's belly, and they both sink to the carpeted floor, tickling and laughing all the way. Rise rolls away, skaking off Set's paw, and leaps at her sister, straddling her waist and going for her sides. Set tries to squirm out from under her, but it's to late. "Hahaha! I told you I'd get you back sis'. " Chortles Rise while Set struggles futiley beneathe her, laughing hysterically as her enemie's paws dig deep into her hyper-sensitive sides. Her legs kick uselessly and her tail wags back and forth with excess energy. As it involuntarily brushes Rises feet,she gasps and falls back, off her sibling. Her feet! Remembered Set. She always was too sensitive down there for her own good.If I can just get them in a head-lock or something... She swiftly scrambled into a kneeling position, whilst Rise recovered and came at her again.
         It went back and forth, om and on, as they both tried to pin the other and get at her most ticklish spots without leaving themselves vulnerable to the same treatment. Eventually, Set gambled by diving around her sister, snatching at her small padded feet. "Eeep! Nohohohoho! NOT THERE!" Screams Rise, falling to the side and shaking with laughter as her twin scribbles all over with her nails. At any moment now, she would have to say the word, have to give in... Out of the corner of her foggy vision, she noticed her tormentors feet waving as she sought a better tickling angle, and reached for them, grabbing them in a headlock identical to the one being opposed on her own limbs. They stayed like that for several long moments, each laughing almost too much to continue tickling the other, while unable to break free and knowing their only hope lay in lasting longer than their enemie. At nearly the exact same moment, they both give a final squirm and go slack, rolling away from each other and gasping "Uncle."
         "Whowee!" You exclaim. "I think we oughta call that a draw. What do you think, Hobbes?"
         "I'll have to agree with you there, man. They each broke in the exact same moment! So, what should we do now?"
          "Oh, not put either of them in the stocks now. The important thing is too find my friend and a way out of here." You reply, helping the twins to their feet and pulling out some water bottles. "Thirsty? Well, guys, there seems to be yet another fork in the road up ahead- maybe the architect was cross-eyed or something- which way should we go?"
144121212.title: And we forgot the popcorn!

144122.content: And which way do you go?
144122.title: Even the smallest choice...

1441221.content:
As you descend the spiral stairs, the tempature rises noticeably and the air that envelops you becomes more humid. After the first full turn, your way is blocked by a glass door, but it's so fogged up you can hardly see anything on the other side.

Curious, and with few other options, you step into the room beyond.

It looks like a vast greenhouse! A domed roof of metal and glass archs high overhead, light rays spiraling down through the humid air to illumate the jungle of exotic plants before you and the circular ground level walls that form the perimeter around you.

Gazing about in wonder, you relize that it's unnervingly quiet in here, even your good hearing able to detect only a few sounds, mostly those made by insects.

Wait-whats that? You hear something like straining laughter in the distance, deeper into the miniature jungle. Knowing this place, probably someone being tickled. Maybe you should hepl them? Still, your friend is why you came here, and perhaps you should press on rather than dawdle to help people who can't look after themselves.
1441221.title: The Greenhouse.

choices: I'm looking for my friend. Have you seen her? (Or him)
I'd like to know more about you two first.
14412211.content:
You start to jog down a stone path that gently curves to your right, so that you can't make out anything more than a short distance in front of you. As the screams of laughter escelate, you run faster. Rounding a sharp bend, you see you've come to a small clearing. The edges of the open space are composed of virtual walls of vines. While many reamain still, blocking off both vision and movement, a few have reached out in places to entrap and tickle a group of unforetunate female furries that appear to have wanderd in here.
         To your immediate left, a bunny girl is virtually mummified in the wall of vegetation, just her head and huge feet potruding from either end. A cluster of vine tips dance all about the surface of the trapped feet, causing the poor girl to howl with laughter and squeeze her eyes shut, while a bigger, stonger pair holds her toes back, making the enormeous soles more sensitive to the tickle.
          Farther away, and to the right, a blonde bob-cat is lying stretched out on the grass, held there by more vines than seems sticktly neccesary. While her own paws are undergoing a tickle assault, her upperbody is suffering far worse. Enough vines to almost completely obscure her bob and weave in the air around her, trailing tips on her belly, prodding her ribs, scratching her under-arms, and tickling in seemingly any other conceivable way.
         Getting over you surprise that the plants themslves will tickle people her, you reach into your backpack and pull out a short machette. Sliding over to the nearer bunny, you begin sawing at the vines holding her. Her writhing about in her little cocoon doesn't disrupt you that much, as it's tight enough to make much thashing an impossibilitie. Your sudden attack on the plants seems to come as a surprise to whatever force controls them, and they are thrown ito disarray as you cut through their tough fibers with ease. Having freed the bunny, who's now lying on the ground trying to catch her breath, you fight at a few remaining vines attempting to entrap you and cross to the bobcat. Who's beginning to really tear up and looks like she might be approaching her absolute tickle limit.
         After freeing her, you drag/carry them both into the middle of the clearing, out of reach of the vines, and wait for them to recover enough to talk to you.

The rabbit is the first to speak. Sitting up, she says: "Thanks. I don't know how long those plants would have tickled us like that If you hadn't showed up. I think we were both starting to lose it there. I'm Chloey, and this is Claire. Who are you, and what brings you to Bing's Tickle Mansion?"
14412211.title: In the garden...

144122112.content:
You decide the best thing to do is to learn more about them before you give them your life's story. After all, you don't know anything about them, or if they'd be willing to help you find your friend. You give them your name, but then tell them "Actually, I'd like to know a little bit more about the two of you first. What are you guys doing in Bing's Mansion, and how'd you get caught up in those vines?"

The two girls look at each other for a moment, then turn back to you. Chloey, the bunny girl, speaks up. "Well, you did just save us. I suppose that's fair. Me and Claire came to the mansion looking to be hired. See, I'm a pretty good botanist, and Claire here is an expert in anthro anatomy. And, well… we both have a healthy interest in tickling." Chloey grinned and blushed slightly. "We both figured we could get jobs here doing something. I know they genetically engineer a bunch of tickling plants here, and I wanted to work on that. And with Claire's knowledge of anthro physiology, she'd be great at a ton of stuff: advanced tickle techniques, medicines to make someone more ticklish… and probably more ideas she could tell you. She'd never say it, but she's kind of a genius." Chloey told you happily, seeming to enjoy the chance to tell their story, eagerly chatting away.

As she talked, you took the opportunity to examine them a bit, hopefully somewhat subtly as the two of you sat on the grass. Chloey looked to be on the short side, with dark brown fur and a white furred front, dark brown eyes, and a long brunette ponytail down her back. She wore a long sleeved shirt and a pair of jeans, but wore nothing on her long bunny feet. You suppose there's no way a rabbit like her would be able to wear shoes anyway.

Claire was a blonde bobcat, about as tall as you. She had light colored, spotted fur on her entire body (that you could see, anyway), short blonde hair, and light colored grey eyes, almost silver. She wore a black sleeveless tank top that came down to the bottom of her ribs, as well as jeans, and you noticed she also went barefoot, her cat paws sticking out from the bottom of the jeans. Her clothing left her arms, underarms, as well as her entire midriff exposed, you noticed. It left a lot of exposed fur, almost as if she were just asking to be tickled…

You pull yourself out of your thorough examination of the two cute girls as you notice Chloey had finished describing themselves. "Oh. Wow, you two sound pretty impressive." You say slowly, hoping they didn't notice how you were checking them out just now. Chloey seemed not to notice, although you thought you saw a curious, knowing look from Claire. "But that still doesn't explain how you got stuck in those vines. If you're a botanist, shouldn't you know better?"

"W-well…" Chloey said in an embarrassed tone. "I wanted to take a closer look. I'd never seen actual tickling vines up close! And these have already made significant improvements from the ones I've studied: they can determine which spots on a victim's body are most ticklish and exploit them, but not so hard that they make the victim pass out and… uhh, anyway, I got too excited, and took us too close." The bunny girl's ears drooped at the admission. "They got me, and it would have been ok until they got to my feet, I'm just so ticklish there…" She said, wiggling her feet at you as she told you about them. "And luckily Claire's feet aren't ticklish, but just about every other inch of her is, so…"

"You don't have to tell him that, Chloey!" The bobcat girl admonished her friend. "Anyway, thanks for getting us out of there. It was a huge help."

"Oh, like you mind!" Chloey retorted. "Claire's even more tickle-obsessed than I am. The only way to keep her from pouncing me is to tickle her first. You should watch out around her!" Chloey grinned, and it seemed like the two were about to get into a playful fight the way they bantered.

"Uh… anyway. You're welcome to come along with us to get farther into the mansion. Just in case we run into anything else… ticklish." Claire told you, inviting you along. "Want to join up for a little while?"
144122112.title: Chloey and Claire

1442.content:
Your name is Percy Koala and you relise that it's getting dark and you'll need to find shelter for the night.

Do you
1442.title: Koala

145.content:
You are a dragon. Well, not quite a full dragon, but you're still over 6 feet tall,muscular, coverd in individualy small but hard reddish scales, and have wings. They're folded right now, as you considerd doing some sky-high investigation of the "mansion", but decided there was too great a risk of being seen by someone on the inside, and you want every advantage you can have when you go in to retrieve your friend.

The mansion towers above you, and stretches off to either side. To the right, it's architecture changes a bit, appearing more like a massive mideveial castle than a concert hall. Maybe ther's a less secure entrance down that way. The view to the left of the path is ineffable due to a small copse of oak trees and dense bushes. There are some large shards of stone lying about in them, as though another structure had once stood there, but has since collapsed. Perhaps there's something to be found in there?

Still, you haven't seen many signs of life or activitie from the building, so maybe you could fly up to the roof and take a closer look without being spotted. After some condsideration, you decide to...
145.title: Decisions, decisions.

choices: (Female)You feel a light brushing on your feet.
1452.content: Those rocks look intriguing, you think, walking up to the thick copse and sorting through the undergrowth. You're search reaveals nothing, and you feel a bit foolish for even bothering to investigate in the first place. Suddenly, you hear a low rumble, and the ground beneath you trembles slightly. Before you can even fully register that, though, you fall straight down, plummeting into the earth. You land, only a few meters below the oaks, in a small, damp tunnel, and immediately begin sliding down, feet first. You slide for several moments in the direction of where the mansion would be if you were above-ground, your attempts at stopping unsuccessful. Suddenly, the tunnel drops, and you land in a hole. You're caught on your backpack , however, and the hole is a bit too small for you, so you rapidly find you're having difficulty either pulling yourself out or going in. (A bit late perhaps, but are you a male or female dragon?) Several seconds later...
1452.title: Exploration-whoops!

1453.content:
You flex your powerful wings, feeling the special muscles in your chest and shoulders go to work as you shoot off the ground in a streak of red, flapping swiftly to alight on the roof. You crouch near a large sky-light built into the dome that the main gateway would have opened into, had you selected that course. The space below looks to be a plush lobby, with a large assembledge of potted plants and several huge sculptures. Several dozen creatures-mythics like yourself, humans, anthros, even 'mons-sit and wait on couches or stand in line behind several large reception desks. You also notice several hallways opening off at the huge chamber's parimeter, but even your fine eyesight can't determine waht the plaques installed above each passage read.
         Shrugging, you pull back and slide off the curve off the roof, easliy landing on the wide ledge at the edge of the dome. Perhaps you could fly to another section of the structure, behind the huge dome, and look in through another window? Yes, maybe in the smaller rooms beyond the main lobby you could find a discreet way in or some sort of sign leading to the dungeons, or wherever prisoners are kept. You stand up to leave, and nearly fall over on the wide eave. You had stood up and started flapping your wings without a problem, but you now notice that your feet seem to have other ideas. There's some sort of slime adhering them to the grey stone, and as your reach down to untangle them, you trip and fall back. You instinctively throw your arms up over your head to break your fall, but are to late. While the goop cushioned your topple, you now find that you are hoplessly stuck, with your arms above your head and legs straight out beneathe you. You struggle, trying to break free, but stop when it seems completely hopeless. The fact that swishing about in the jelly causes it lap and you and tickle irrtitaingly all over your body also lowers your resolve to free yourself that way.
1453.title: I hear they keep pigeons off buildings this way.

choices: Who knows waht else is up here?! Head back down and around.
Try to find a different way in from above.
14533.content:
You suddenly inhale sharply as something prods your belly. Looking down, you see a single round tendril of goo curiously poking and prodding away at your abdomen. "Ha-hay! Stop tha-hat!" You giggle, squirming as the relentless pokes become more numerous and insistent. Another tentacle rises up out of the slime, and starts dragging its narrow tip along your abs, working up to your ribs, just exerting enough force for you to feel it throught your scales, setting your nerves ablaze.
         Unconsciously, you suck in your belly to avoid the continuing explorations of the first slimy thing. Your ribbs stick out against your hard skin, and the second feeler brushes over these next, but abruptly changes to prodding rather than stroking. It lingers on each and every intercostal muscle between the ribbs, poking in hard-not uncomfortably, but still sending all your nerves to tingling.
         Still more start to rise form the substance as you watch, struggling helplessly against the intensifying tickles, causing ripples to shudder across the surface of your bizarre restraints. One reaches up to the clawed toes on your right foot, and you can feel it tightening around the digits and pulling back. Three surprisingly hard limbs begin scratching methodically on the large sole, and your leg spasmes reflexively as you desperately attempt to avoid the feelings surging through it. Several other feelers now work away at relentlessly kneading all your ribs, while a pair proceed to start scratching hard at your underarms, similar to the treatment both your hapless feet are undergoing by now. "Ahahahahaha! Sthohhop! Help-Hahahaha! St-hoo-hop!" You shriek, as you are almost barried beneathe the waves of horrible tentacles. It seems that no area you weren't already wearing clothes on reamians unscathed, as the electrifying sensations shoot down your nerves from every angles, rebounding and travelling to the farthest points of your frantically writhing body.
         You slowly go hoars,e and are almost completely exhausted when you realize your struggles are starting to have an affect. You manage to get your arms and wings free, than your torso. As you tear yourselfe out of the defeated trap and onto safer ground, you realize that your sweat must dillute or dissolve the slime, and are glad that whoever designed the thing must have had some mercy-or more likely didn't realize the flaw. Slowly recuperating, you think of your next plan of attack.
14533.title: (you/I)'ll never eat jellow again!

choices: Something hits you from the back!
145332.content:
If your body is tired, your mind is only renewed in determination to get inside. Grateful for your own high endurance, you pump your wings and lift back off the roof, gently wheeling through the refreshing air towards the rear of the building. As you climb higher, a complex of courtyards, towers, causeways, and other interconnected buildings opens up, any given individual section of which appearing as a chaotic mess by itself, but that, when added together, all add up to make an elegant and enchanting castle.

         Beyond, a huge blue ocean basks in the sun, collecting and reforging the reflected light from the day into a universe of stars that would do any night proud. Seagulls -some possessing four wings- swoop and harry unseen schools of fish, screeching abuse that could almost have been spoken speech.Up close, the distinct smell of the sea is even more pronounced, the scent carried up the cliffside by phalanxes of advancing waves.

          Before you can develop any particular attachment to the view, you're descending again, this time at the inside of the far exterior wall. Your landing pint is to be the corner of a heavily landscaped courtyard, where a small side door promises discreet ingress. The decorative battlements just pass to the side, when-
145332.title: Para-trooping without even a 'chute.

choices: Tell you what; if I bust you now, you'll help me find my way around in there
Now if you could just direct me to the dungeons...
1453321.content:
As you prepare to touch down, the air, undisturbed by sapient language, suddenly resonates with -gasp!- laughter.
         'Hahahahaaaa! Wait! HA-HA! Waitwaitwaitwaitwait! Comeback come-back! Ahahahah!"
          The pleas rapidly fade as you descend, ducking into a sculpted grassy hollow in the ground. Irked, you look around wildly for the source of the noise. Just yell out your position over the intercom, why don't they? Still, it's silent now; and slowly you begin to relax.
         "Hey-wait no! Nohohoho-ahahah! Help, for sky's sake! Ahahaha!" the call spikes up once again, and your sharp ears fully register as originating behind you... Which is occupied by a blank stone wall, grown with creepers. Curious, you straighten up and listen in, straining to hear a renewed sound of laughter. You wait a few seconds and-there! Someone calling out for help and laughing like crazy; behind the wall.
         Bemused and a little wary, you swoop up again, wanting to quiet them down if nothing else.

         Efficiently, you shoot out over the wall, re-bound off the rampart, and descend on the other side. The laughing is definitely growing louder, you note, passing the bottom of the wall and continuing past the cliff overhang. Said laughing transforms into gasping breaths amidst the squawking of gulls as you ease into a hover.

         Under the lip of the overhanging cliff, a metallic birdcage, large enough to hold you fairly comfortably and weathered by years under the influence of sea foam, hangs on a chain. Inside, clutching at the bars and slowly giggling herself back to sensibility is an avian; a sparrow, to be exact. Humanoid, she's completely covered in short brown feathers, flecked with white and patched in russet, accept for her bare feet, while a veritable mane of longer, dark auburn plumes sprouting from her head give the illusion of hair.

         She swipes one hand over her head -unlike you, there is little difference between her wings and her arms proper- and grips the cage bars with the other as you drift in closer. You notice that she seems to be siting fairly comfortably on a hanging bench-like piece of wood suspended in the cage centre, but that her feet protrude form the bottom of the cage, somehow trapped between the bars, with her two biggest, middling toes clamped to the metal constraints.

         "Thanks-(hehehe) thank sky you're here! Quick, you gotta spring me before they get back!" She declares, fluttering nervously in the confines.
         "How? And before who gets back?" After carefully testing the chain, you alight on the top of the cage.
         "The seagulls of course and -look, you're new here, right?"
          "Why do you say that?"
          'I've already been here a few months, training, and we don't get many dragons. I'de recognize you if you'd been here before. You must be a recent hire-on."
         "Uh, yeeeaaah, sure. This is my first day." You say, deciding to take the chance and run with it.
         "Well as to why i'm here, I, uh, I got in trouble earlier." The cage creaks as she shifts below you. "One of my captives got the drop on my when I let them out for a second, and locked me in a seismic sarcophagus-"
          "A what?"
          "It's a contraption kinda like a really airy, roomy coffin. Only the inside is covered in feathers or brushes or whatever, and it vibrates and shakes. Tickles like crazy. Anyhow, they locked me up tight and got to a portal before I could manage to get the safe word out and sound an alarm."
         "Ah. I...See."
         "And now, I've been sentenced to have my feet coated in oil and been left to hang out here."
          "While, if you don't mind my, saying, that doesn't sound so bad."
          She squeaks indignantly. "While I do mind! This isn't crude crap on my paws; it's Aerial Oil. Sea birds get a bit on their wings and they start flying better than ever; every flying carrion muncher on this coast is a junkie for the stuff. I've had whole flocks of the little devils buzzing around my feet, trying to press their wings in as much as possible to get at the oil. Good thing for me I managed to catch your attention just now, or I'de have been here the rest of the day too. I've been stuck here all day."
          "All da- How long, exactly?" You ask, wondering if you should switch the topic to the dungeons or any recent imports of tickling subjects, including possibly your friend.
          "A couple of hours. I was supposed to have been pulled up and let out most of an hour ago- up apparently it slipped somebody's mind. But now that you're here, you can go in and talk to my boss and get them to pull me up, right?"
          "Erm, uh, it depends, where do you work in there?"
          "In a sublevel above the prison cells proper; it shouldn't be hard to find."
         "That's... Good to know. But what was your name again? I'll probably have tot ell them to jog their memory."
          "Whoops! Sorry; I don't think I told you. It's Cameilia."
1453321.title: Bird Cage.

15.content:
You approach the enormous Oak door. Complex carvings of feathers and some sort of story cover the entirety. Despite it's ancient appearance, it slides open electrically. Inside is a modern lobby made of glass and brushed aluminum.

A friendly creature greets you at the desk and gives you a visitor's pass. "There will be a tour in a few minutes if you want to wait," she says. You give a quick smile and start heading down a nearby hall, instead.

What are you, by the way?
15.title: We all have our secrets

151.content: Pokemon? We get those often! Please, be specific.
151.title: A Pokemon?

choices: A Pikachu with a regular colured body with dark parts of my body being red
A Pikachu with a light blue body and yellow in my dark parts (like the stripes)
A Pikachu that has a brown body and the rest is blue
1511.content:
"I'm a Pikachu" you say. "Your a Pikachu? Ah, we get those quite alot in this place. Do you have any characteristics that makes you different from other Pikachus?" The creature asks.
I am...
1511.title: Your a Pikachu

152.content: Ok, a Digimon. But you might need to be a tad more specific...
152.title: Digimon?

153.content: Hmmm, strange of a human to enter such premises... All right, are you a male or female?
153.title: Human?

154.content: Hmmm... A furry. We enjoy those; all right, can ya be specific?
154.title: A furry?

155.content: Ah, scalies, this will be interesting... Be more specific.
155.title: A scaly?

info.brief_description: Bing's Tickle Mansion from a fresh perspective
info.description:
If you like tickling humans, pokemon, digimon, furries, cartoons, or anything in that vein. then Bing's Tickle Mansion was the story for you. But that story is more or less full now.

So let us start anew, from a new perspective. Once again, cartoon cameos are appreciated.
info.pretty_title: At The Gates of Bing's Tickle Mansion
